title: # Tonami
instructions:
Please wait for instructions from the interviewer.  
   
 Please note that your audio will be recorded.  
 By clicking Next, you agree to allowing your recordings to be shared anonymously with the team and trusted evaluators.

calibration.instructions: We'll need to calibrate our algorithmn to your voice. Please speak the following section aloud:
calibration.phrase: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Do you think bees care what humans think is impossible?
calibration.success: Thank you for patience. You may now proceed to the next module
calibration.fail: Calibration failed. Please try recording again.
calibration.options_instructions: We'll need to calibrate our algorithmn to your voice. Please pick the best description of your voice:

ratings.label:
Great job!  
 Practice some more to make sure you've got it, or move onto the next module.

Almost there!  
 It sounds good, but there are still some parts that could be improved if you wanted to.

Not quite, try again?  
 Listen to your recording versus the example's and try to hear the differences.

end_page:
Thank you for your participation❤️  
 If you would like to know more, please contact us at fydp.team3@gmail.com
